title: Don't let Clintons back in
text:
ANALYSIS/OPINION:

Now is the time for all Trump-Pence loyalists to bravely return to our president’s side and inner circles, to faithfully aid in the re-election of Donald J. Trump.

This loyalty and effort is not only required at ballot boxes nationwide, but throughout the Bill and Hillary Clinton-controlled fake news media, “snowflake” academia, Hollywood entertainment and deep-state-operative network.

Make no mistake: The Clintons and their long line of former employees and operatives controlling every three-letter D.C. agency are the kingpins behind all #Resistance, Russia-collusion, anonymous op-ed and fake-whistleblower efforts, as well as every new impeachment attempt.

The Clintons are fiendishly interested in erasing Bill’s brand as the most recent U.S. president to be impeached, while Hillary relentlessly seeks to slyly wiggle the couple’s way back into White House in any way possible.

Do not be fooled. All the incivility, hatred, hoaxes and harassment hurled each day at our politically inexperienced commander-in-chief has been masterminded, financed and deployed in secret by none other than deep-state “supreme leaders” and scorched-earth specialists Bill and Hillary Clinton.

Only those smart enough to stand up to the Clintons will be able to save our country from the next iteration of the “Clinton Foundation.”

BARON CHRISTOPHER HANSON

McLean, Va.
